{"id":1274576217,"question_id":259,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1717278794,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1274576217/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int threeSumSmaller(vector<int>& nums, int target) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        //edge cases\n        if(n<3)\n            return ans;\n        \n        int sum_i_j =0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n-2; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<n-1; j++) {\n                sum_i_j = nums[i]+nums[j];\n                for(int k=j+1; k<n; k++) {\n                    if(sum_i_j+nums[k]<target)\n                       ans++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
